SCTX:
begin nchulfetingthRight

;this one moves the door aside.

float counter
short doOnce

if ( CellChanged == 1 )
	if ( doOnce == 2 )
		"in_dwrv_wall_nchuleftingth1"->disable
	endif
endif

if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	Set counter to 1
endif

if ( counter == 0 )
	return
endif

if ( doOnce == 2 ) 
	MessageBox "The crank seems to be stuck."
	Set counter to 0
	return
endif

if ( doOnce == 0 )
	PlaySound "Door Stone Open"
	set doOnce to 1
endif

Set counter to counter + GetSecondsPassed

Rotate X 80

;should move pretty fast to avoid player seeing it close up

"in_dwrv_wall_nchuleftingth1"->MoveWorld Y 80

if ( counter > 6 )
	Set doOnce to 2
	Set counter to 0
endif

end nchuleftingthRight
